casebody.data:
EMBRACE HOME LOANS, INC.
v.
Linia Thomas BURL a/k/a Linia T. Burl a/k/a Linia Burl No. 2018-OC-1876 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 20, 2019

Second application for reconsideration not considered. Judgment is final. See La. Code Civ. P. art. 2167. No further filings shall be accepted in this matter.
